link_desc:
Description

Template for Freebox monitoring with Zabbix.

Freebox is a personnal home and small office modem of Free. A french ISP.

This template retreive :

  • Temperture (disk / switch / CPU)
  • Disk status
  • Connection status
  • Connection speed rate
  • Freebox uptime

Usage

You need to install Python 3.6 or above on your Zabbix Server (or proxy). The fbx_monitor.py need to be copied on your external script directory with execute permission.

You have to execute the command fbx_monitor.py authorize with the same user as user who execute zabbix daemon. After that, check your Freebox front panel to allow the application.
author: Remi BONNET
